nodes.text: Tress Parion was a female Human from the planet Zakuul who served in the Knights of Zakuul during the era in which the Eternal Empire ruled over the galaxy. An elite Knight who held the title of Paladin, Parion wore dark armor and wielded a blue lightsaber in battle. She was stationed aboard the Star Fortress over the planet Alderaan, and died around 3631 BBY when the Star Fortress was invaded and destroyed.

Tress Parion was added to BioWare's 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 Digital Expansion. She is one of four possible Paladins that can spawn during the Alderaan version of the "The Star Fortress" Flashpoint; as the Star Fortress is destroyed with all hands aboard, this article assumes that Parion died either in battle or when the battle station exploded.
